duties_responsibilities.duty: Administer the provisions of the MTA Defined Benefit Pension Plan, including less complex analysis and calculations.
Gather, analyze, and perform basic estimates and calculations in both PeopleSoft Pension module and spreadsheet applications.
Review applications and paperwork submitted by DB Plan members for completeness; provide retirement application and related paperwork to members.
Provide excellent customer service, track status of work, and maintain appropriate knowledge and training.
Ensure that all assignments are completed accurately and within agreed Service Level Agreement guidelines.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a related field (preferred)
3 years of work experience in pensions or pension-related field
